Name: Range is HOT!
About the game: Range is HOT! is a VR competition shooting simulator. Shoot your way through a variety of targets and courses to get the lowest time possible. Climb the leaderboards and hone your skills from the comfort of your home. Did we mention the ammo is free? Features 36 Multigun courses utilizing handgun, rifle, and shotgun shooting 10 Practical Shooting Classifiers Trap and Skeet Practice Static and Moving Targets Scout and practice course sections to develop a strategy for maximum effectiveness Outdoor ranges and indoor shoothouses In-Game Tournament Events Since entering Early Access, we've added: 30+ Courses 3 New Environments: Rocky Mountain Range, Warehouse, Night Range 7 New Firearms: O/U Shotgun, Bertino2011 Pistol, DaviDae320 pistol, Bearbelli Shotgun, Fossberg Shotgun, Grizlikov80 Rifle, SLAP17 Rifle Tournaments 3 New Optics: Red dot, Back Up Iron Sights, Hi Vis Pistol Sights Offset/Canted Sight Mount End of Round Celebrations 3 New Target Types Trap and Skeet Practice Ranges Customizable Loadouts 10 Practical Shooting Classifiers Shot Timer Telekinesis Grabbing UI Overhaul Bug Fixes & Performance Optimizations Additionally, we're developing a course editor. This feature is not live yet, but here's a sneak peek:
